protocol.name: P-GSE33505-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-2
protocol.text: A. thaliana plants were frozen in liquid nitrogen. Each sample contained tissues from at least 8 plants

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-3
protocol.text: The seeds were surface-sterilized for 15 min in 10% bleach, washed five times with sterile water, and plated on half-strength Murashige and Skoog medium. Plants were stratified at 4C for 2 days in darkness and then transferred to an environmental chamber set at 22C with a 16-h-light/8-h-dark cycle (light intensity 120 mmol m-2 s-1). After 2 to 3 weeks, seedlings were also potted in a mixed potting medium of peat and vermiculite (1:2), and placed in a growth room at 22C with a 16-h-light/8-h-dark cycle (light intensity 120 mmol m-2 s-1).

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-4
protocol.text: Total RNAs were isolated using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE33505-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
